H₂aláh₂! Welcome to the homepage for Andrew & Brenna Byrd's *An Immersive Introduction to Proto-Indo-European*.

![](assets/images/korh2ikos.png){alt="H₂aláh₂!" fig-align="center"}

At this site, there are three tabs to click on:

1)  Nominals: paradigms for nouns, adjectives, and pronouns
2)  Verbs: paradigms for verbs
3)  Lexicon: a complete lexicon of PIE, as used in the PIE novellas.

Please reach out to <a href="mailto:andrewbyrd@uky.edu">Andrew Byrd</a> if you any issues or questions.
